name: Lilia Ackerman
what_you_do: Lilia Ackerman offers thriving relationship coaching, helping individuals heal from unresolved issues and improve their relationships through personal experience and a structured program.
who_you_serve: Lilia serves individuals seeking to overcome limiting beliefs and improve their overall well-being, particularly those interested in personal transformation and relationship enhancement.
current_projects: The Way to Strong Relationships Workshop
bio: Certified Life Coach, Certified Empowered Well-Being Coach, over 20 years in the wellness industry
business_focus: Lilia Ackerman offers thriving relationship coaching, helping individuals heal from unresolved issues and improve their relationships through personal experience and a structured program.
